Html:
Thanks very  much for fixing the 10/25 hard/normal Trial of the Crusader stuff.   It was really confusing before (thanks Blizzard) and is much simpler now.  The only problem I have with the filters now is that the 5man Coliseum gear still appears in the "other" category instead of under the 5man and 5man heroic filters.  I will set up my own filters & category to fix this as I did in the last version, but it would be nice to have this fixed for the next release :)

 

Where we are able to put a comment in the comments field for each item, is it possible to use these comments in the filters as well as the default locations (which we can't manually update)?  I did try earlier without success but I can't check it out properly at the moment as I am updating my cache from Wowhead as the cache that came with the latest version today seems to be updated from armory and the WowHead stuff finally seems to be more accurate (ie.  WowHead correctly labels the Champion's Seals & Tier (258) pieces).

Yes, the Notes field is counted for filters.

Sorry about the 5man gear showing up in Other, I'll get that fixed.
